test_gsi_mass_energy.cpp

22 #include "mutation++.h"
23 #include "Configuration.h"
24 #include "TestMacros.h"
25 #include <catch.hpp>
26 #include <Eigen/Dense>
27 
28 using namespace Mutation;
29 using namespace Catch;
30 using namespace Eigen;
31 
32 TEST_CASE("Solution of the MassEnergyBalanceSolver is converged.", "[gsi]")
33 {
34  const double tol = std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon();
35  Mutation::GlobalOptions::workingDirectory(TEST_DATA_FOLDER);
36 
37  SECTION("Inert Surface in Radiative Equilibrium.")
38  {
39  // Mixture
40  MixtureOptions opts("seb_inert_NASA9_ChemNonEq1T");
41  Mixture mix(opts);
42 
43  // Setting up
44  const size_t set_state_with_rhoi_T = 1;
45  const size_t pos_T_trans = 0;
46  size_t ns = mix.nSpecies();
47  size_t nT = mix.nEnergyEqns();
48  size_t neq = ns + nT;
49 
50  // Conditions T = 3000K and p = 100Pa
51  VectorXd Teq = VectorXd::Constant(nT, 3000.);
52  double Peq = 100.; // Pa
53  mix.equilibrate(Teq(pos_T_trans), Peq);
54 
55  // Setting number of iterations for the solver
56  const int iter = 100;
57  mix.setIterationsSurfaceBalance(iter);
58 
59  // Mass gradient
60  VectorXd xi_e(ns);
61  xi_e = Map<const VectorXd>(mix.X(), ns);
62  double dx = 1.e-3;
63  mix.setDiffusionModel(xi_e.data(), dx);
64 
65  // Temperature gradient
66  VectorXd T_e = Teq;
67  mix.setGasFourierHeatFluxModel(T_e.data(), dx);
68 
69  // Initial conditions of the surface are the ones in the first
70  // physical cell
71  VectorXd rhoi_s(ns);
72  mix.densities(rhoi_s.data());
73  VectorXd T_s = VectorXd::Constant(nT, 1800.);
74  mix.setSurfaceState(rhoi_s.data(), T_s.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
75 
76  // Solve balance and request solution
77  mix.solveSurfaceBalance();
78  mix.getSurfaceState(rhoi_s.data(), T_s.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
79 
80  // Verifying the solution gives low residual in the balance equations
81  mix.setState(rhoi_s.data(), T_s.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
82  VectorXd xi_s(ns);
83  xi_s = Map<const VectorXd>(mix.X(), ns);
84 
85  // Compute diffusion velocities
86  VectorXd dxidx(ns);
87  dxidx = (xi_s - xi_e) / dx;
88  VectorXd vdi = VectorXd::Zero(ns);
89  double E = 0.;
90  mix.stefanMaxwell(dxidx.data(), vdi.data(), E);
91 
92  // Conductive heat flux
93  VectorXd dTdx(nT);
94  dTdx = (T_s - T_e) / dx;
95  VectorXd lambda(nT);
96  mix.frozenThermalConductivityVector(lambda.data());
97 
98  // Get surface production rates
99  VectorXd wdot(ns);
100  mix.setSurfaceState(rhoi_s.data(), T_s.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
101  mix.surfaceReactionRates(wdot.data());
102 
103  // Surface radiation
104  const double eps = 1.;
105  VectorXd q_srad = VectorXd::Zero(nT) ;
106  q_srad(pos_T_trans) = Mutation::SB * eps * pow(T_s(pos_T_trans), 4);
107 
108  // Building balance functions
109  VectorXd F(neq);
110  double rho = rhoi_s.sum();
111  F.head(ns) = rhoi_s.cwiseProduct(vdi) - wdot;
112  F.tail(nT) = lambda.cwiseProduct(dTdx) + q_srad;
113 
114  // Compute error
115  double err = F.lpNorm<Infinity>();
116  CHECK(err == Approx(0.0).margin(tol));
117  }
118 
119  SECTION("Mass and Energy Balance Catalysis in Radiative Equilibrium.")
120  {
121  // Mixture
122  MixtureOptions opts("seb_catalysis_NASA9_ChemNonEq1T");
123  Mixture mix(opts);
124 
125  // Setting up
126  const size_t set_state_with_rhoi_T = 1;
127  const size_t pos_T_trans = 0;
128  size_t ns = mix.nSpecies();
129  size_t nT = mix.nEnergyEqns();
130  size_t neq = ns + nT;
131 
132  // Conditions T = 3000K and p = 100Pa
133  VectorXd Teq = VectorXd::Constant(nT, 3000.);
134  double Peq = 100.; // Pa
135  mix.equilibrate(Teq(pos_T_trans), Peq);
136 
137  // Setting number of iterations for the solver
138  const int iter = 100;
139  mix.setIterationsSurfaceBalance(iter);
140 
141  // Mass gradient
142  VectorXd xi_e(ns);
143  xi_e = Map<const VectorXd>(mix.X(), ns);
144  double dx = 1.e-3;
145  mix.setDiffusionModel(xi_e.data(), dx);
146 
147  // Temperature gradient
148  VectorXd T_e = Teq;
149  mix.setGasFourierHeatFluxModel(T_e.data(), dx);
150 
151  // Initial conditions of the surface are the ones in the first
152  // physical cell
153  VectorXd rhoi_s(ns);
154  mix.densities(rhoi_s.data());
155  VectorXd T_s = VectorXd::Constant(nT, 1800.);
156  mix.setSurfaceState(rhoi_s.data(), T_s.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
157 
158  // Solve balance and request solution
159  mix.solveSurfaceBalance();
160  mix.getSurfaceState(rhoi_s.data(), T_s.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
161 
162  // Verifying the solution gives low residual in the balance equations
163  mix.setState(rhoi_s.data(), T_s.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
164  VectorXd xi_s(ns);
165  xi_s = Map<const VectorXd>(mix.X(), ns);
166 
167  // Compute diffusion velocities
168  VectorXd dxidx(ns);
169  dxidx = (xi_s - xi_e) / dx;
170  VectorXd vdi(ns);
171  double E = 0.;
172  mix.stefanMaxwell(dxidx.data(), vdi.data(), E);
173 
174  // Conductive heat flux
175  VectorXd dTdx(nT);
176  dTdx = (T_s - T_e) / dx;
177  VectorXd lambda(nT);
178  mix.frozenThermalConductivityVector(lambda.data());
179 
180  // Get surface production rates
181  VectorXd wdot(ns);
182  mix.setSurfaceState(rhoi_s.data(), T_s.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
183  mix.surfaceReactionRates(wdot.data());
184 
185  // Species and mixture enthalpies
186  VectorXd v_hi(ns*nT);
187  mix.getEnthalpiesMass(v_hi.data());
188  VectorXd v_h(nT);
189  v_h(pos_T_trans) = rhoi_s.dot(v_hi.head(ns));
190 
191  // Surface radiation
192  const double eps = .86;
193  VectorXd q_srad = VectorXd::Zero(nT);
194  q_srad(pos_T_trans) = Mutation::SB*eps*pow(T_s(pos_T_trans), 4);
195 
196  // Chemical Energy Contribution
197  VectorXd v_hi_rhoi_vi= VectorXd::Zero(nT);
198  v_hi_rhoi_vi(pos_T_trans) = -v_hi.head(ns).dot(rhoi_s.cwiseProduct(vdi));
199 
200  // Building balance functions
201  VectorXd F(neq);
202  double rho = rhoi_s.sum();
203  F.head(ns) = rhoi_s.cwiseProduct(vdi) - wdot;
204  F.tail(nT) = lambda.cwiseProduct(dTdx) + q_srad + v_hi_rhoi_vi;
205 
206  // Compute error
207  double err = F.lpNorm<Infinity>();
208  CHECK(err == Approx(0.0).margin(tol));
209  }
210 
211  SECTION("Mass and Energy Balance Ablation.")
212  {
213  // Mixture
214  MixtureOptions opts("seb_oxidation_NASA9_ChemNonEq1T");
215  Mixture mix(opts);
216 
217  // Setting up
218  const size_t set_state_with_rhoi_T = 1;
219  const size_t pos_T_trans = 0;
220  size_t ns = mix.nSpecies();
221  size_t nT = mix.nEnergyEqns();
222  size_t neq = ns + nT;
223 
224  // Conditions T = 3000K and p = 100Pa
225  VectorXd Teq = VectorXd::Constant(nT, 3000.);
226  double Peq = 100.; // Pa
227  mix.equilibrate(Teq(pos_T_trans), Peq);
228 
229  // Setting number of iterations for the solver
230  const int iter = 100;
231  mix.setIterationsSurfaceBalance(iter);
232 
233  // Mass gradient
234  VectorXd xi_e(ns);
235  xi_e = Map<const VectorXd>(mix.X(), ns);
236  double dx = 1.e-3;
237  mix.setDiffusionModel(xi_e.data(), dx);
238 
239  // Temperature gradient
240  VectorXd T_e = Teq;
241  mix.setGasFourierHeatFluxModel(T_e.data(), dx);
242 
243  // Initial conditions of the surface are the ones in the first
244  // physical cell
245  VectorXd rhoi_s(ns);
246  mix.densities(rhoi_s.data());
247  VectorXd T_s = VectorXd::Constant(nT, 1800.);
248  mix.setSurfaceState(rhoi_s.data(), T_s.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
249 
250  // Solve balance and request solution
251  mix.solveSurfaceBalance();
252  mix.getSurfaceState(rhoi_s.data(), T_s.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
253  double rho = rhoi_s.sum();
254 
255  // Verifying the solution gives low residual in the balance equations
256  mix.setState(rhoi_s.data(), T_s.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
257  VectorXd xi_s(ns);
258  xi_s = Map<const VectorXd>(mix.X(), ns);
259 
260  // Compute diffusion velocities
261  VectorXd dxidx(ns);
262  dxidx = (xi_s - xi_e) / dx;
263  VectorXd vdi(ns);
264  double E = 0.;
265  mix.stefanMaxwell(dxidx.data(), vdi.data(), E);
266 
267  // Conductive heat flux
268  VectorXd dTdx(nT);
269  dTdx = (T_s - T_e) / dx;
270  VectorXd lambda(nT);
271  mix.frozenThermalConductivityVector(lambda.data());
272 
273  // Get surface production rates
274  VectorXd wdot(ns);
275  mix.setSurfaceState(rhoi_s.data(), T_s.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
276  mix.surfaceReactionRates(wdot.data());
277 
278  // Blowing flux (should be zero for catalysis)
279  double mblow;
280  mix.getMassBlowingRate(mblow);
281 
282  // Species and mixture enthalpies
283  VectorXd v_hi(ns*nT);
284  mix.getEnthalpiesMass(v_hi.data());
285  VectorXd v_h(nT);
286  v_h(pos_T_trans) = (rhoi_s/rho).dot(v_hi.head(ns));
287 
288  // Surface radiation
289  const double eps = .86;
290  VectorXd q_srad = VectorXd::Zero(nT);
291  q_srad(pos_T_trans) = Mutation::SB*eps*pow(T_s(pos_T_trans), 4);
292 
293  // Chemical Energy Contribution
294  VectorXd v_hi_rhoi_vi= VectorXd::Zero(nT);
295  v_hi_rhoi_vi(pos_T_trans) = -v_hi.head(ns).dot(rhoi_s.cwiseProduct(vdi));
296 
297  // Building balance functions
298  VectorXd F(neq);
299  F.head(ns) = (rhoi_s/rho)*mblow + rhoi_s.cwiseProduct(vdi) - wdot;
300  F.tail(nT) = -lambda.cwiseProduct(dTdx) - q_srad + mblow*v_h -
301  v_hi_rhoi_vi;
302 
303  // Compute error
304  double err = F.lpNorm<Infinity>();
305  CHECK(err == Approx(0.0).margin(tol));
306  }
307 
308  SECTION("Mass and Energy Balance with Two Temperatures at Equilibrium."){
309  // Mixture
310  MixtureOptions opts("seb_aircarbon11_ablation_NASA9_ChemNonEqTTv");
311  Mixture mix(opts);
312 
313  // Setting up
314  const size_t set_state_with_rhoi_T = 1;
315  const size_t pos_T_trans = 0;
316  const size_t pos_T_vib = 1;
317  size_t ns = mix.nSpecies();
318  size_t nT = mix.nEnergyEqns();
319  size_t nE = 1;
320  size_t neq = ns + nE;
321 
322  // Conditions T = 3000K and p = 100Pa
323  VectorXd Teq = VectorXd::Constant(nT, 3000.);
324  double Peq = 100.; // Pa
325  mix.equilibrate(Teq(pos_T_trans), Peq);
326 
327  // Setting number of iterations for the solver
328  const int iter = 100;
329  mix.setIterationsSurfaceBalance(iter);
330 
331  // Mass gradient
332  VectorXd xi_e(ns);
333  xi_e = Map<const VectorXd>(mix.X(), ns);
334  double dx = 1.e-3;
335  mix.setDiffusionModel(xi_e.data(), dx);
336 
337  // Temperature gradient
338  VectorXd T_e = Teq;
339  mix.setGasFourierHeatFluxModel(T_e.data(), dx);
340 
341  // Initial conditions of the surface are the ones in the first
342  // physical cell
343  VectorXd rhoi_s(ns);
344  mix.densities(rhoi_s.data());
345  VectorXd T_s(nT);
346  T_s(pos_T_trans) = 1800.;
347  T_s(pos_T_vib) = 2200.;
348  mix.setSurfaceState(rhoi_s.data(), T_s.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
349 
350  // Solve balance and request solution
351  mix.solveSurfaceBalance();
352  mix.getSurfaceState(rhoi_s.data(), T_s.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
353  double rho = rhoi_s.sum();
354 
355  // Verifying the solution gives low residual in the balance equations
356  mix.setState(rhoi_s.data(), T_s.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
357  VectorXd xi_s(ns);
358  xi_s = Map<const VectorXd>(mix.X(), ns);
359 
360  // Compute diffusion velocities
361  VectorXd dxidx(ns);
362  dxidx = (xi_s - xi_e) / dx;
363  VectorXd vdi(ns);
364  double E = 0.;
365  mix.stefanMaxwell(dxidx.data(), vdi.data(), E);
366 
367  // Conductive heat flux
368  VectorXd dTdx(nT);
369  dTdx = (T_s - T_e) / dx;
370  VectorXd lambda(nT);
371  mix.frozenThermalConductivityVector(lambda.data());
372 
373  // Get surface production rates
374  VectorXd wdot(ns);
375  mix.setSurfaceState(rhoi_s.data(), T_s.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
376  mix.surfaceReactionRates(wdot.data());
377 
378  // Blowing flux (should be zero for catalysis)
379  double mblow;
380  mix.getMassBlowingRate(mblow);
381 
382  // Species and mixture enthalpies
383  VectorXd v_hi(ns*nT);
384  mix.getEnthalpiesMass(v_hi.data());
385  double h = (rhoi_s/rho).dot(v_hi.head(ns));
386 
387  // Surface radiation
388  const double eps = .86;
389  double q_srad = Mutation::SB*eps*pow(T_s(pos_T_trans), 4);
390 
391  // Chemical Energy Contribution
392  double v_hi_rhoi_vi = -v_hi.head(ns).dot(rhoi_s.cwiseProduct(vdi));
393 
394  // Building balance functions
395  VectorXd F(neq);
396  F.head(ns) = (rhoi_s/rho)*mblow + rhoi_s.cwiseProduct(vdi) - wdot;
397  F(nE) = -lambda.dot(dTdx) - q_srad + mblow*h - v_hi_rhoi_vi;
398  F.tail(nT-1).setConstant(0.);
399 
400  // Compute error
401  double err = F.lpNorm<Infinity>();
402  CHECK(err == Approx(0.0).margin(tol));
403  }
404 }
